extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).

basic.description: Studies in representative critical theories from antiquity onwards, with special emphasis on modern criticism both in its theoretical and practical aspects.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Studies Literary Criticism and Theory
